lead_paragraph: Streisand is Daisy Gamble, a kooky chain-smoker desperate to kick the habit. She finds the perfect cure in the form of Dr. Chabot (Yves Montand), a psychiatrist who uses hypnosis. When Daisy goes into a trance, however, she can regress into past liv
